question: You are working for a company. You need to take some time off work and want to ask your manager about this.Write a letter to your manager. In your letter:•	explain why you want to take time off work•	give details of the amount of time you need•	suggest how your work could be covered while you are away
text: I am writing this letter to bring in your kind knowledge that I would be needing a day off from office on Jan 31 2022,As I booked an appointment from an Eye-Specialist for my Daughter,as she is complaining about the shortness and blurring of vision for so long.

Since the testing of Optima is a long process ,I am afraid if something is detected I would have taken her for further inspections.However,I am assuming it would be a bit long procedure,Hence,It would be wise If your kind self allow me to take two days to leave.
Furthermore,keeping in mind the recent deadline for the completion of ABC company and the submission of Proposal ,I have already aligned Mr Zain to look after the queries ,it arrives on my behalf.

I am hoping these temporary arrangements will definitely be feasible If only get approved by your kind self.Also,I will be available on call during those2 days and affirmed that things will go as smooth as they should be .
Please,Accord your approval in this regard. Looking Forward to hearing a positive response .
